metadata.title: AKS Container with Host Path Volume Mount
metadata.description: Detects containers mounting sensitive host paths which can be used for privilege escalation.

properties.displayName: AKS Container with Sensitive Host Path Mount
properties.description: Detects when a container mounts sensitive host filesystem paths like /etc, /var/run/docker.sock, or /. This can be used for container escape or privilege escalation.
properties.query:
let SensitivePaths = dynamic(["/", "/etc", "/var/run/docker.sock", "/var/run/crio/crio.sock", "/var/lib/kubelet", "/var/lib/docker", "/proc", "/sys", "/root", "/home"]);
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend requestObject = log.requestObject
| extend user = log.user
| where verb in ("create", "update", "patch")
| where objectRef.resource == "pods"
| extend volumes = requestObject.spec.volumes
| mv-expand volume = volumes
| extend hostPath = tostring(volume.hostPath.path)
| where isnotempty(hostPath)
| where hostPath in (SensitivePaths) or hostPath startswith "/etc" or hostPath startswith "/var/run"
| extend
    PodName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    VolumeName = tostring(volume.name),
    HostPath = hostPath,
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    ClusterName = Resource
| where Namespace !in ("kube-system", "gatekeeper-system", "azure-arc", "calico-system")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    VolumeName,
    HostPath,
    Username
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, VolumeName, HostPath, Username

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Pod '{{PodName}}' in namespace '{{Namespace}}' mounted sensitive host path '{{HostPath}}'. This can be used for container escape.
